well the larger forces are in some
measure the product of individual action
too naturally there are natural
phenomena of of over which we have uh
limited control and most of History uh
was shaped by the weather because most
of History consists of agricultural
societies trying to eek out a living
with pretty poor technology now I don't
tend to study that period I'm I'm a
modernist concerned with the
post-industrial world uh and in that
world the role of the weather diminishes
though it Still Remains an important
factor and who knows it may become more
important as uh as time goes on but
allowing for those natural constraints
under which all historical processes
operate the individual's decisions uh
never stop being taken everybody is
making a decision every day even if it's
a very humble decision do I plant
tomorrow or wait a week uh but the the
great forces that historians used to
talk about when they try to to make
deterministic arguments are just the net
result of all the individual decisions
uh uh collected together Adam Smith In
The Wealth of Nations says that when
everybody pursues his own self-interest
there's an invisible hand that operates
uh which actually produces benign
positive economic outcomes if people are
left to decide freely now I don't think
the world is quite so so simple uh and I
don't believe that the free play of
individual Choice necessarily produces
optimal outcomes still I think that's a
reasonable working assumption for
decisions about economics the trouble is
that people don't live their lives just
with some simple economic utility
function trying to profit maximize often
we make our individual decisions for
quite batty reasons uh because for
example we believe uh in the imminent
end of the world or we believe in the
attainable U IA that's been promised to
us by some secular prophet and then our
individual decisions can really become
uh quite dysfunctional and produce Wars
and Wars are one of the things I like to
study the great disruptions that more or
less uh account for most of the big
changes uh in human history and Society
